original_title: Culture Club: A Kiss Across the Ocean
overview: Recorded live at Hammersmith Odeon December 1983  1 - I'll Tumble 4 Ya  2 - Mister Man  3 - It's A Miracle  4 - Karma Chameleon  5 - Black Money  6 - Love Twist  7 - Do You Really Want To Hurt Me  8 - Miss Me Blind  9 - Church Of The Poision Mind  10 - Victims  11 - Time  12 - White Boy  13 - Melting Pot.
title: Culture Club: A Kiss Across the Ocean
